nodes.text: The Separatist Base was a bunker which served as headquarters for some of the Mantellian Separatists on the island of Mannett Point in Ord Mantell, during the Separatist War.
The Separatist Base first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online roleplaying game (MMORPG) by BioWare released on December 20, 2011.
